title: Peterson Sees 'Altered' World for Travel
itunes:title: Peterson Sees 'Altered' World for Travel
description:
Joel Peterson, Chairman of JetBlue, says the travel industry will recover from the coronavirus crisis but it will be a slow comeback and travelers should expect health care measures to be put in place. He also talks about his book "Entrepreneurial Leadership" and why leaders need take risks and be more transparent.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Jason Kelly. Producer: Doni Holloway.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
